LocalSoftware.Name: Core/blast
LocalSoftware.Description: NCBI BLAST+ sequence alignment package. The program compares nucleotide or protein sequences to sequence databases and calculates the statistical significance of matches.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/samtools
LocalSoftware.Description: SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating alignments in a per-position format.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/cutadapt
LocalSoftware.Description: Cutadapt removes adapter sequences from DNA high-throughput sequencing data.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/mytaxa
LocalSoftware.Description: MyTaxa - Assign taxonomy to metagenomic fragments.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/cplex
LocalSoftware.Description: CPLEX - High-performance mathematical programming solver for linear programming, mixed integer programming, and quadratic programming.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/usearch
LocalSoftware.Description: USEARCH is a unique sequence analysis tool with thousands of users world-wide. USEARCH offers search and clustering algorithms that are often orders of magnitude faster than BLAST.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/soapdenovo2
LocalSoftware.Description: soapdenovo2 - novel short-read assembly method that can build a de novo draft assembly for the human-sized genomes

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/RAPSearch2
LocalSoftware.Description: RAPSearch2 is a tool for fast protein similarity searches.

LocalSoftware.Description: Mplus is a latent variable modeling program with a wide variety of analysis capabilities.

LocalSoftware.Description: IDBA is a practical iterative De Bruijn Graph De Novo Assembler for sequence assembly in bioinfomatics.

LocalSoftware.Description: HMMER biosequence analysis using profile hidden Markov models

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/qiime
LocalSoftware.Description: QIIME is an open source software package for comparison and analysis of microbial communities, primarily based on high-throughput amplicon sequencing data (such as SSU rRNA) generated on a variety of platforms, but also supporting analysis of other types of data (such as shotgun metagenomic data).

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/blat
LocalSoftware.Description: Blat is an alignment tool like BLAST, but it is structured differently. On DNA, Blat works by keeping an index of an entire genome in memory. Thus, the target database of BLAT is not a set of GenBank sequences, but instead an index derived from the assembly of the entire genome.

LocalSoftware.Description: transrate - Quality assessment and comparison of transcriptome assemblies

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/muscle
LocalSoftware.Description: Popular multiple alignment software

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/hugeseq
LocalSoftware.Description: HugeSeq is a fully integrated system for genome analysis from mapping reads to the identification and annotation of all types of variants: SNPS, Indels and SVs.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/tassel
LocalSoftware.Description: While TASSEL has changed considerably since its initial public release in 2001, its primary function continues to be providing tools to investigate the relationship between phenotypes and genotypes1. As indicated by its title â€“ Trait Analysis by aSSociation, Evolution and Linkage â€“ TASSEL has multiple functions, including association study, evaluating evolutionary relationships, analysis of linkage disequilibrium, principal component analysis, cluster analysis, missing data imputation and data visualization.

As indicated by its title â€“ Trait Analysis by aSSociation, Evolution and Linkage â€“ TASSEL has multiple functions, including association study, evaluating evolutionary relationships, analysis of linkage disequilibrium, principal component analysis, cluster analysis, missing data imputation and data visualization.

LocalSoftware.Domain: mixture modeling for taxonomic analysis of metagenomes
LocalSoftware.Name: Core/taxypro
Core/tophat
LocalSoftware.Description: TopHat2 is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads. It aligns RNA-Seq reads to mammalian-sized genomes using the ultra high-throughput short read aligner Bowtie, and then analyzes the mapping results to identify splice junctions between exons.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/tophat
LocalSoftware.Description: TopHat2 is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads. It aligns RNA-Seq reads to mammalian-sized genomes using the ultra high-throughput short read aligner Bowtie, and then analyzes the mapping results to identify splice junctions between exons.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/tophat
LocalSoftware.Description: TopHat2 is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads. It aligns RNA-Seq reads to mammalian-sized genomes using the ultra high-throughput short read aligner Bowtie, and then analyzes the mapping results to identify splice junctions between exons.

LocalSoftware.Description: TopHat2 is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads. It aligns RNA-Seq reads to mammalian-sized genomes using the ultra high-throughput short read aligner Bowtie, and then analyzes the mapping results to identify splice junctions between exons.

LocalSoftware.Description: PLplot is a cross-platform software package for creating scientific plots.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/scan-for-matches
LocalSoftware.Description: scan_for_matches is a utility written in C for locating patterns in DNA or protein FASTA files.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/vcftools
LocalSoftware.Description: VCFtools is a program package designed for working with VCF files, such as those generated by the 1000 Genomes Project. The aim of VCFtools is to provide easily accessible methods for working with complex genetic variation data in the form of VCF files.

LocalSoftware.Name: Core/mosaik
LocalSoftware.Description: MOSAIK is a reference-guided aligner for next-generation sequencing technologies.
